mdRecord.dcterms:title: Instructions to Applicants for Appointment in Medical Department of the Army
mdRecord.dcterms:description: A typed document from the Civil War explaining how to apply for appointment in the Medical Department of the Army. The document is signed in type by Samuel Preston Moore, Surgeon General C.S.A. The document was dispatched from the Surgeon General's Office, Richmond, Nov. 20, 1862.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Military occupations
